ModMetaData.name: E-Series
ModMetaData.author: Nalzurin and Kalmin
ModMetaData.description: Enlist new mechanoids to defend your colony! Lore-Friendly and with Vanilla-esque art. Find remnants of these units and service them back to working order; Also includes a mechanoid variant to fight! Coding done by Nalzurin, original mod by Sl4vP0weR and art by Kalmin. Commissioned by Harvy
